alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:16PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland, west central Pottawatomie and west central McClain Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Norman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norman, Newcastle, Noble, Slaughterville, Pink, Goldsby, Tribbey, Etowah, Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 97 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
